summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the BlipTextImageModel's initialization, configuration loading, forward pass signatures, handling of hidden states and input embeddings, pretrained model loading, common attribute presence, training behavior, gradient checkpointing, and TorchScript conversion.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the multimodal text-image model for production use in vision-language applications, reducing regression risk and ensuring proper training and inference functionality.
